Shapes.description: Collection of basic items that are regularly used in web designs.
Shapes.author: Duong Thanh An

Script.comments: Scripts for calculating table column widths

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: Bound.fromBox($box, $textPadding.y), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign, multi: true})

Property.name: cornerStyle
Property.p:enumValues: ['none|None', 'all|All rounded', 'top|Rounded top corners', 'bottom|Rounded bottom corners', 'left|Rounded left corners', 'right|Rounded right corners']

foreignObject.div: Rich text pane contains hyper text

div.style: position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;

input.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; -moz-user-focus: ignore; vertical-align: middle; margin: 0px !important;

div.style: position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;

input.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; -moz-user-focus: ignore; vertical-align: middle; -moz-box-sizing: border-box;

div.style: position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;

Property.name: text
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textArea'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(5, 5, size.w - 10, size.h -10), font: $textFont, align: $textAlign})

div.style: width: 100%; height: 100%; position: relative; display: table;
display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; text-align: left; line-height: 1px;
position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;
width: 100%; height: 100%; position: relative; display: table;
display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; text-align: left; line-height: 1px;
position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;

For.Box: var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension($fixedWidth.value ? $width.x : size.w, size.h); /* depends $textFont $textContent $customStyle */

foreignObject.div: Rich text pane contains hyper text

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textDiv'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.max(size.w, 80) , Math.max(size.h, 10)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1)})

For.Box: var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension(size.w, size.h); /* depends $textFont $textContent $customStyle */

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textDiv'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.max(size.w, 80) , Math.max(size.h, 10)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1)})

For.Box: var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension(size.w, size.h); /* depends $textFont $textContent $customStyle */
var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension($width.x, size.h); /* depends $hairLine */

Property.name: textContent
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textDiv'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.max(size.w, 80) , Math.max(size.h, 10)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1)})

For.Box: var size = F.elementSize("textDiv"); new Dimension(size.w, size.h); /* depends $textFont $customStyle $homeCustomStyle $endCustomStyle $sepCustomStyle $textContent $spaceSize */

Property.name: content
Property.p:editInfo: var size = F.elementSize('textDiv'); ({targetName: 'htmlObject', bound: new Bound(0, 0, Math.max(size.w, 80) , Math.max(size.h, 10)), font: $textFont, align: new Alignment(0, 1), multi: true})

div.style: position: absolute; top: 0px; left: 0px; width: 100%; height: 100%;
